Edges-Demon -- Male Human Heroic Demon
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Infernal Stamina: +1 Vigor Step
Spirited: +1 Spirit Step
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Healing: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Claws (Climbing): +2 Athletics (climbing)
Size: 0
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 26
Features
Edges (15 points): Armored Hide; Bite; Claws; Demon; Demonic Immortality; Hellfire; Incorporeal; Mystic Powers (Demon (Possessor)); Mystic Powers (Demon (Summoner)); Mystic Powers (Demon (Tempter)); Mystic Powers (Demon (Trickster)); Scorch; Sense Supernatural; True Demon; Wings Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Demon: Has Ageless, Bespoil, Darkvision, Deal Maker, Doesn't Breathe, Environmental Resistance (Cold, Electricity, Heat), Immune To Disease And Poison, Infernal Stamina, Rage, Spirited, and Weakness (Cold Iron) features
Ageless: Does not age
Darkvision: R10" Ignores all illumination penalties and 2 points from invisibility
Deal Maker: May grant a boon in exchange for a hindrance and a later favor
Doesn't Breathe: Does not require oxygen
Incorporeal: Unaffected by the physical world; successful Spirit allows becoming corporeal for 1 rd
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Sense Supernatural: R10" May sense presence of supernatural beings and effects
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Combat
Parry: 7 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 12 (6) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Bite (d8+d6); Chainsaw (2d6+4); Claws (d8+d4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armored Hide: +4 Armor
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Scorch: Increased Hellfire effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Demonic Immortality: Reforms d4 dy after being slain
Environmental Resistance (Cold,Electricity,Heat): +4 vs. cold, electricity, and heat effects/-4 damage from cold, electricity, and heat
Hellfire: R12" May create and move a 1" radius fire that inflicts 2d6 damage or attack with a 9" cone or 12" stream that inflicts 2d6 damage
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Immune To Disease And Poison: Has immunity to disease and poison
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
True Demon: Suffers half damage from nonmagical attacks other than cold iron
Weakness (Cold Iron): Suffers +4 damage from cold iron weapons
Wings: Fly Pace 12
Arcana
Power Points: 40
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Demon (Possessor)): 10 Power Points/May cast Boost/Lower Trait, Curse, Nightmares, or Puppet for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Demon (Summoner)): 10 Power Points/May cast Protection, Summon Ally, Summon Demon, or Zombie for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Demon (Tempter)): 10 Power Points/May cast Boost/Lower Trait, Disguise, Empathy, or Mind Reading for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Demon (Trickster)): 10 Power Points/May cast self Deflection, Disguise, Fear, or Illusionary Horrors for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Bespoil: May create minor ugliness effects
